user.title: User
user.description: Analyze the given access right to a given user

schema.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a case, which is a customer issue or problem.

Id.title: Case ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

CaseNumber.title: Case Number
CaseNumber.description: Assigned automatically when each case is inserted. It can't be set directly, and it can't be modified after the case is created.

SuppliedName.title: Name
SuppliedName.description: The name that was entered when the case was created. Label is Name.

SuppliedEmail.title: Email Address
SuppliedEmail.description: The email address that was entered when the case was created. Label is Email.If your organization has an active auto-response rule, SuppliedEmail is required when creating a case via the API. Auto-response rules use the email in the contact specified by ContactId. If no email address is in the contact record, the email specified here is used.

SuppliedPhone.title: Phone
SuppliedPhone.description: The phone number that was entered when the case was created. Label is Phone.

SuppliedCompany.title: Company
SuppliedCompany.description: The company name that was entered when the case was created. Label is Company.

Type.title: Case Type
Type.description: The type of case, such as Feature Request or Question.

Status.title: Status
Status.description: The status of the case, such as New, Closed, or Escalated. This field directly controls the IsClosed flag. Each predefined Status value implies an IsClosed flag value. For more information, see CaseStatus.

Reason.title: Case Reason
Reason.description: The reason why the case was created, such as Instructions not clear, or User didn‚Äôt attend training.

Origin.title: Case Origin
Origin.description: The source of the case, such as Email, Phone, or Web. Label is Case Origin.

Language.title: Language
Language.description: The language of the case. The Language field is available when you enable Einstein Case Classification in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited edition orgs with Service Cloud. By default, only Einstein classification apps use this field.

IsVisibleInSelfService.title: Visible in Self-Service Portal
IsVisibleInSelfService.description: Indicates whether the case can be viewed in the Customer Service Portal, Partner Service Portal, and Self-Service Portal (true) or not (false). This field is applied for case visibility in the Partner Relationship Management, Customer Service Portal, and the earlier version of Self Service Portal. The field does not alter sharing and will not prevent usage of a direct URL to a case if a portal user has read or write access.

Subject.title: Subject
Subject.description: The subject of the case. Limit: 255 characters.

Priority.title: Priority
Priority.description: The importance or urgency of the case, such as High, Medium, or Low.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: A text description of the case. Limit: 32 KB.

IsClosed.title: Closed
IsClosed.description: Indicates whether the case is closed (true) or open (false). This field is controlled by the Status field; it can't be set directly. Label is Closed.

ClosedDate.title: Closed Date
ClosedDate.description: The date and time when the case was closed.

IsEscalated.title: Escalated
IsEscalated.description: Indicates whether the case has been escalated (true) or not. A case's escalated state does not affect how you can use a case, or whether you can query, delete, or update it. You can set this flag via the API. Label is Escalated.

HasCommentsUnreadByOwner.title: New Self-Service Comment
HasCommentsUnreadByOwner.description: Indicates whether a case contains comments that the case owner hasn‚Äôt read (true) or not (false).

HasSelfServiceComments.title: Self-Service Commented
HasSelfServiceComments.description: Indicates whether a case has comments added by a Self-Service user (true) or not (false). Only visible when Customer Portal is enabled.

IsClosedOnCreate.title: Closed When Created
IsClosedOnCreate.description: Indicates whether the case was closed at the same time that it was created (true) or not (false). This flag is read-only and is automatically set when a record is created. It can't be set to true unless the IsClosed flag is also true.

IsSelfServiceClosed.title: Closed by Self-Service User
IsSelfServiceClosed.description: Indicates whether the case is closed for Self-Service users (true) or not (false).

SlaStartDate.title: Entitlement Process Start Time
SlaStartDate.description: Shows the time that the case entered an entitlement process. If you have the Edit permission on cases, you can update or reset the time.

IsStopped.title: Stopped
IsStopped.description: Indicates whether an entitlement process on a case is stopped (true) or not (false).

StopStartDate.title: Stopped Since
StopStartDate.description: The date and time an entitlement process was stopped on the case.This field is available in API version 18.0 and later.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

ContactPhone.title: Contact Phone
ContactPhone.description: Telephone number for the contact. Label is Contact Phone. This field is available in API version 38.0 and later.

ContactMobile.title: Contact Mobile
ContactMobile.description: Mobile telephone number for the contact. Label is Contact Mobile. This field is available in API version 38.0 and later.

ContactEmail.title: Contact Email
ContactEmail.description: Email address for the contact. The Case.ContactEmail field displays the Email field on the contact that is referenced by Case.ContactId. Label is Contact Email. This field is available in API version 38.0 and later.

ContactFax.title: Contact Fax
ContactFax.description: Fax number for the contact. Label is Contact Fax. This field is available in API version 38.0 and later.

Comments.title: Internal Comments
Comments.description: Used to insert a new CaseComment. Email textarea has a length of 4000 chars.

data.label: Case
data.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a case, which is a customer issue or problem.

schema.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a milestone (required step in a customer support process) on a Case.

Id.title: Case Milestone ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

StartDate.title: Start Date
StartDate.description: The date and time the milestone started on the case.

TargetDate.title: Target Date
TargetDate.description: The date and time the milestone must be completed.

CompletionDate.title: Completion Date
CompletionDate.description: The date and time the milestone was completed.

IsCompleted.title: Completed
IsCompleted.description: Indicates whether the milestone is completed (true) or not (false).

IsViolated.title: Violation
IsViolated.description: Indicates whether the milestone is violated (true) or not (false).

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

TargetResponseInMins.title: Target Response (Mins)
TargetResponseInMins.description: The time to complete the milestone in minutes.

TargetResponseInHrs.title: Target Response (Hours)
TargetResponseInHrs.description: The time to complete the milestone in hours.

TargetResponseInDays.title: Target Response (Days)
TargetResponseInDays.description: The time to complete the milestone in days.

TimeRemainingInMins.title: Time Remaining (Min:Sec)
TimeRemainingInMins.description: Time remaining to reach the milestone target. The format is minutes and seconds.

TimeRemainingInHrs.title: Time Remaining (Hour:Min)
TimeRemainingInHrs.description: Time remaining to reach the milestone target, measured in hours.

TimeRemainingInDays.title: Time Remaining (Days)
TimeRemainingInDays.description: Time remaining to reach the milestone target, measured in days.

ElapsedTimeInMins.title: Elapsed Time (Mins)
ElapsedTimeInMins.description: The time required to complete a milestone in minutes.

ElapsedTimeInHrs.title: Elapsed Time (Hours)
ElapsedTimeInHrs.description: The time required to complete a milestone in hours.

ElapsedTimeInDays.title: Elapsed Time (Days)
ElapsedTimeInDays.description: The time required to complete a milestone in days.

TimeSinceTargetInMins.title: Time Since Target (Min:Sec)
TimeSinceTargetInMins.description: The time elapsed since the milestone target. The format is minutes and seconds.

TimeSinceTargetInHrs.title: Time Since Target (Hour:Min)
TimeSinceTargetInHrs.description: The time elapsed since the milestone target, measured in hours.

TimeSinceTargetInDays.title: Time Since Target (Days)
TimeSinceTargetInDays.description: The time elapsed since the milestone target, measured in days.

data.label: Case Milestone
data.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a milestone (required step in a customer support process) on a Case.

schema.description: [Service Cloud] Represents the customer support an account or contact is eligible to receive.

Id.title: Entitlement ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: The type of entitlement, such as Web or phone support.

StartDate.title: Start Date
StartDate.description: The first date the entitlement is in effect.

EndDate.title: End Date
EndDate.description: The last day the entitlement is in effect.

IsPerIncident.title: Per Incident
IsPerIncident.description: Indicates whether the entitlement is limited to supporting a specific number of cases (true) or not (false).

CasesPerEntitlement.title: Cases Per Entitlement
CasesPerEntitlement.description: The total number of cases the entitlement supports.

RemainingCases.title: Remaining Cases
RemainingCases.description: The number of cases the entitlement can support. This field decreases in value by one each time a case is created with the entitlement.

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Status of the entitlement, such as Expired.

SvcApptBookingWindowsId.title: Operating Hour ID
SvcApptBookingWindowsId.description: The operating hours of the entitlement. This field is visible only if Field Service is enabled.

WorkOrdersPerEntitlement.title: Work Orders Per Entitlement
WorkOrdersPerEntitlement.description: Total number of work orders available for this entitlement.

RemainingWorkOrders.title: Remaining Work Orders
RemainingWorkOrders.description: The number of agreed work orders remaining to be created.

data.label: Entitlement
data.description: [Service Cloud] Represents the customer support an account or contact is eligible to receive.

Id.title: Incident Related Item ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

Id.title: Problem Related Item ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

schema.description: [Service Cloud] An Incident is any unplanned business interruption that has wide-sweeping impacts and requires an urgent fix. This object contains the details of the incident, documenting the history of the incident from registration to closure.

Id.title: Incident ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

Subject.title: Subject
Subject.description: A brief description of the incident.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: A description of the incident. This field can store up to 32 KB of data, but only the first 255 characters appear in reports.

DetectedDateTime.title: Detected Date Time
DetectedDateTime.description: The date and time (in UTC) when the incident was first detected.

StartDateTime.title: Start Date Time
StartDateTime.description: The date and time (in UTC) when the incident began.

EndDateTime.title: End Date Time
EndDateTime.description: The date and time (in UTC) when the incident ended.

ResolutionSummary.title: Resolution Summary
ResolutionSummary.description: A description of possible steps to resolve the incident.

ResolutionDateTime.title: Resolution Date Time
ResolutionDateTime.description: The date and time (in UTC) when the incident was resolved.

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Any custom or granular stages a customer may want to track.

Urgency.title: Urgency
Urgency.description: A measure of how long the resolution can be delayed until an incident, problem, or change has a significant business impact.

Priority.title: Priority
Priority.description: The impact and urgency of the incident.

ReportedMethod.title: Reported Method
ReportedMethod.description: Indicates how the incident was reported to customer service.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: The type of incident, for example, question or problem. Administrators set field values.

SubCategory.title: Sub Category
SubCategory.description: The type of incident. One level deeper than Category. Administrators set field values.

PriorityOverrideReason.title: Priority Override Reason
PriorityOverrideReason.description: The reason why a priority should be changed or edited.

IsMajorIncident.title: Major Incident
IsMajorIncident.description: Indicates whether the incident is business-critical. If set to true, the incident is widespread and business-critical. The default value is false.

data.label: Incident
data.description: [Service Cloud] An Incident is any unplanned business interruption that has wide-sweeping impacts and requires an urgent fix. This object contains the details of the incident, documenting the history of the incident from registration to closure.

data.label: Case Article

table.name: CaseArticle
table.label: Case Article
table.description: [Service Cloud] Represents the association between a Case and a KnowledgeArticle.

schema.description: [Service Cloud] Represents the association between a Case and a KnowledgeArticle.

Id.title: Case Article ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

ArticleLanguage.title: Language
ArticleLanguage.description: The language of the article associated with the case.

ArticleVersionNumber.title: Version Number
ArticleVersionNumber.description: The number assigned to a version of an article. This field is available in API version 24.0 and later.

IsSharedByEmail.title: Is Shared by Email
IsSharedByEmail.description: Indicates that the article has been shared with the customer through an email.

data.description: [Service Cloud] Represents the association between a Case and a KnowledgeArticle.

data.label: Swarm

table.name: Swarm
table.label: Swarm
table.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a team of agents, Salesforce users, or Slack users in a Slack channel or thread dedicated to solving a problem. This problem can be related to a support case, incident, sales opportunity, or change request.

schema.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a team of agents, Salesforce users, or Slack users in a Slack channel or thread dedicated to solving a problem. This problem can be related to a support case, incident, sales opportunity, or change request.

Id.title: Swarm ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

StartedDateTime.title: Started Date Time
StartedDateTime.description: Date and time the swarm started.

EndedDateTime.title: Ended Date Time
EndedDateTime.description: Date and time the swarm ended.

CollaborationUrl.title: Collaboration URL
CollaborationUrl.description: URL of the Slack channel or thread.

IsDedicatedChannel.title: Dedicated Channel
IsDedicatedChannel.description: Indicates if the swarm is happening in a dedicated channel (true) or in an existing channel (false).

HelpNeeded.title: Swarm Description
HelpNeeded.description: Short description of the problem that the swarm is trying to solve.

MessageKey.title: Message Timestamp
MessageKey.description: ID of the Slack thread or message.

data.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a team of agents, Salesforce users, or Slack users in a Slack channel or thread dedicated to solving a problem. This problem can be related to a support case, incident, sales opportunity, or change request.

Id.title: Case Related Issue ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

Id.title: Case Solution ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

data.description: [Core] Represents a detailed description of a customer issue and the resolution of that issue.

schema.description: [Core] Represents a detailed description of a customer issue and the resolution of that issue.

Id.title: Solution ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

SolutionNumber.title: Solution Number
SolutionNumber.description: An identifying number that is assigned automatically when a solution is created. It can‚Äôt be set directly, and it can‚Äôt be modified.

SolutionName.title: Title
SolutionName.description: Required. If a client application creates a new Solution and a value for this field is unspecified, a hyphen (-), the default value for this field, is used. Limit: 255 characters. Label is Title.

IsPublished.title: Public
IsPublished.description: Indicates whether the Solution has been published (true) or not (false). A solution‚Äôs published state does not affect how it can be used, or whether you can query, update, or delete it. Label is Public. Note Prior to Spring ‚Äò14, the label was Visible in Self-Service Portal.

IsPublishedInPublicKb.title: Visible in Public Knowledge Base
IsPublishedInPublicKb.description: Indicates whether the Solution has been published as a Public Solution (true) or not (false). Label is Visible in Public Knowledge Base. This field only applies to solutions, not articles in the public knowledge base.

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Required. The status of the solution. Directly controls the IsReviewed value. To obtain the status values in the picklist, a client application can query the SolutionStatus.

IsReviewed.title: Reviewed
IsReviewed.description: Indicates whether the Solution has been reviewed (true) or not (false). This flag can only be set indirectly via the Status picklist. Each predefined Status value implies an IsReviewed value. Label is Reviewed.

SolutionNote.title: Description
SolutionNote.description: The details of the Solution record. Limit: 32,000 characters. Label is Solution Details. Note If you have HTML Solutions enabled, any HTML tags used in this field are verified before the object is created or updated. If invalid HTML is entered, an error is thrown. Any JavaScript used in this field is removed before the object is created or updated.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

TimesUsed.title: Num Related Cases
TimesUsed.description: Number of times this solution has been used. Label is Num Related Case.

IsHtml.title: Is Html
IsHtml.description: Indicates whether the Solution is an HTML solution (true) or not (false).

data.label: Solution
Case Team Member

table.name: CaseTeamMember
table.label: Case Team Member
table.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a case team member, who works with a team of other users to help resolve a case.

schema.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a case team member, who works with a team of other users to help resolve a case.

Id.title: Team Member Id
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

data.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a case team member, who works with a team of other users to help resolve a case.

Id.title: Category Data ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

data.label: Service Contract

table.name: ServiceContract
table.label: Service Contract
table.description: [Field Service Lightning] Represents a customer support contract (business agreement).

schema.description: [Field Service Lightning] Represents a customer support contract (business agreement).

Id.title: Service Contract ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

Term.title: Term (months)
Term.description: Number of months that the service contract is valid.

StartDate.title: Start Date
StartDate.description: The first day the service contract is in effect.

EndDate.title: End Date
EndDate.description: The last day the service contract is in effect.

ActivationDate.title: Activation Date
ActivationDate.description: The initial day the service contract went into effect (whereas StartDate may include a renewal date).

ApprovalStatus.title: Approval Status
ApprovalStatus.description: Approval status of the service contract.

Tax.title: Tax
Tax.description: Total taxes for the service contract.

Subtotal.title: Subtotal
Subtotal.description: Total of the service contract line items (products) before discounts, taxes, and shipping are applied.

TotalPrice.title: Total Price
TotalPrice.description: Total of the contract line items (products) after discounts and before taxes and shipping.

LineItemCount.title: Line Items
LineItemCount.description: Number of ContractLineItem records associated with the service contract.

ContractNumber.title: Contract Number
ContractNumber.description: Unique number automatically assigned to the service contract.

SpecialTerms.title: Special Terms
SpecialTerms.description: Any terms specifically agreed to and tracked in the service contract.

Discount.title: Discount
Discount.description: Discount percentage for the service contract.

GrandTotal.title: Grand Total
GrandTotal.description: Total price of the service contract plus shipping and taxes.

Status.title: Status
Status.description: The status of the service contract, such as Inactive.

AdditionalDiscount.title: Additional Discount
AdditionalDiscount.description: Extra discount percentage for the service contract. Available in API version 55.0 and later.

data.description: [Field Service Lightning] Represents a customer support contract (business agreement).

data.label: Case Comment

table.name: CaseComment
table.label: Case Comment
table.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a comment that provides additional information about the associated Case.

schema.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a comment that provides additional information about the associated Case.

Id.title: Case Comment ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

IsPublished.title: Published
IsPublished.description: Indicates whether the CaseComment is visible to customers in the Self-Service portal (true) or not (false). Label is Published. This is the only CaseComment field that can be updated via the API.

CommentBody.title: Body
CommentBody.description: Text of the CaseComment. The maximum size of the comment body is 4,000 bytes. Label is Body.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

data.description: [Service Cloud] Represents a comment that provides additional information about the associated Case.

data.label: Case Contact Role

table.name: CaseContactRole
table.label: Case Contact Role
table.description: [Service Cloud] Represents the role that a given Contact plays on a Case.

schema.description: [Service Cloud] Represents the role that a given Contact plays on a Case.

Id.title: Contact Role ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Name of the role played by the contact on this case, such as Technical Contact, Business Contact, Decision Maker, and so on. Must be unique‚Äîthere can't be multiple records in which the CaseId, ContactId , and Role values are identical. Different contacts can play the same role on the same case. A contact can play different roles on the same case.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

data.description: [Service Cloud] Represents the role that a given Contact plays on a Case.

Id.title: Problem ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified On
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

data.description: [Service Cloud] Provides access to the concrete object that represents a Knowledge article version.

schema.description: [Service Cloud] Provides access to the concrete object that represents a Knowledge article version.

Id.title: Knowledge Article Version ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

ValidationStatus.title: Validation Status
ValidationStatus.description: Shows whether the content of the article has been validated. Possible values are Validated and Not Validated. The default value is Not Validated. This field is available in API version 24.0 or later.

PublishStatus.title: Publication Status
PublishStatus.description: The publication status for the article: Draft: any draft articles. Online: articles published in Salesforce Knowledge. Archived: archived articles. A user must have the ‚ÄúManage Articles‚Äù permission enabled to use Online. Article queries and searches in SOQL or SOSL require that you specify either the PublishStatus or the Id field in the WHERE clause. You can search for only one publication status per article type in a single SOSL query. When searching for articles with a PublishStatus of Archived, also check that IsLatestVersion equals false in your WHERE clause.

VersionNumber.title: Version Number
VersionNumber.description: The number assigned to a version of an article. This field is available in API version 24.0 and later.

IsLatestVersion.title: Is Latest Version
IsLatestVersion.description: Indicates whether the article is the most current version. (true) or not (false). This field can be true on the online or published version, a draft version in the primary language, a draft version in a translation, and the latest archived version. However, you can‚Äôt filter by (PublishState=‚ÄôOnline‚Äô) and (IsLatestVersion=false) because the online version is also the latest version. This field is available in API version 24.0 and later.

IsVisibleInApp.title: Visible In Internal App
IsVisibleInApp.description: Required. Indicates whether the article is visible in the Articles tab (true) or not (false).

IsVisibleInPkb.title: Visible In Public Knowledge Base
IsVisibleInPkb.description: Required. Indicates whether the article is visible in the public knowledge base (true) or not (false).

IsVisibleInCsp.title: Visible to Customer
IsVisibleInCsp.description: Required. Indicates whether the article is visible in the Customer Portal (true) or not (false).

IsVisibleInPrm.title: Visible to Partner
IsVisibleInPrm.description: Required. Indicates whether the article is visible in the partner portal (true) or not (false).

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

IsMasterLanguage.title: Is Primary Language
IsMasterLanguage.description: Indicates whether the article has one or more translations associated with it (true) or not (false).

Language.title: Language
Language.description: The language that the article is written in, such as French or Chinese (Traditional).Querying or searching articles in SOSL require that you specify the Language field in the WHERE clause. The language must be the same for all article types. Before API version 47.0, you must include the Language field to filter queries on Knowledge article versions. In API version 47.0 and later, you can filter queries on Knowledge article versions with or without Language depending on what you are querying.

Title.title: Title
Title.description: Required. Article's title. Maximum size is 255 characters.

UrlName.title: URL Name
UrlName.description: Required. Represents the article's URL. Can contain alphanumeric characters and hyphens but can't begin or end with a hyphen. Use a unique value regardless of context. (For example, a unique value allows you to get expected results when running an Apex test with SeeAllData set to false.) UrlName is case-sensitive and its maximum size is 255 characters.

ArchivedDate.title: Archived Date
ArchivedDate.description: The date the article version was archived.

Summary.title: Summary
Summary.description: Summary of the article. Maximum size is 1000 characters.

NextReviewDate.title: Next Review Date
NextReviewDate.description: The date when the article must next be reviewed for accuracy. Available in API version 58.0 and later.

ArticleNumber.title: Article Number
ArticleNumber.description: The unique number automatically assigned to the article when it's created. You can't change the format or value for this field.

FirstPublishedDate.title: First Published Date
FirstPublishedDate.description: The date when the article was first published.

LastPublishedDate.title: Last Published Date
LastPublishedDate.description: The date when the article was last published.

ArticleArchivedDate.title: Article Archived Date
ArticleArchivedDate.description: The date the article was archived.

ArticleCaseAttachCount.title: Article Case Association Count
ArticleCaseAttachCount.description: The number of cases where this article is attached.

ArticleCreatedDate.title: Article Created Date
ArticleCreatedDate.description: The date the article was created.

ArticleMasterLanguage.title: Article Primary Language
ArticleMasterLanguage.description: The article's original language. Only accessible if your knowledge base supports multiple languages.

ArticleTotalViewCount.title: Article Total View Count
ArticleTotalViewCount.description: Total number of views for the article.

IsOutOfDate.title: Out of Date
IsOutOfDate.description: Indicates whether the source article has been updated since this translated version was created (true) or not (false).

TranslationCompletedDate.title: Translation Completed Date
TranslationCompletedDate.description: Date and time when the article was last translated. Only accessible if your knowledge base supports multiple languages.

TranslationExportedDate.title: Translation Exported Date
TranslationExportedDate.description: Date and time when the article was last exported for translation. Only accessible if your knowledge base supports multiple languages.

TranslationImportedDate.title: Translation Imported Date
TranslationImportedDate.description: Date and time when the article was last imported for translation. Only accessible if your knowledge base supports multiple languages.

AssignmentDate.title: Assignment Date
AssignmentDate.description: The date the article was assigned to a user.

AssignmentDueDate.title: Assignment Due Date
AssignmentDueDate.description: The due date when an article is assigned.

AssignmentNote.title: Assignment Note
AssignmentNote.description: Notes to the assignee from the user who assigned the article.

MigratedToFromArticleVersion.title: Mapping info between old Article Version and migrated Article Version
MigratedToFromArticleVersion.description: The ID for the corresponding pre- or post-migration article version. Contains values only in orgs that migrate from Classic to Lightning Knowledge. Available in API version 43.0 and later.

data.label: Knowledge

data.description: [Service Cloud] Provides access to the concrete object that represents a Knowledge article, the parent object for article versions.

schema.description: [Service Cloud] Provides access to the concrete object that represents a Knowledge article, the parent object for article versions.

Id.title: Knowledge Article ID
Id.description: Globally unique string that identifies a record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when a user last modified this record.

MasterLanguage.title: Language
MasterLanguage.description: The article's original language. Only accessible if your knowledge base supports multiple languages.

ArticleNumber.title: Article Number
ArticleNumber.description: The unique number automatically assigned to the article when it's created. You can't change the format or value for this field.

ArchivedDate.title: Archived Date
ArchivedDate.description: The date when the article was archived.

FirstPublishedDate.title: First Published Date
FirstPublishedDate.description: The date when the article was first published.

LastPublishedDate.title: Last Published Date
LastPublishedDate.description: The date when the article was last published.

CaseAssociationCount.title: Case Association Count
CaseAssociationCount.description: The number of cases attached to the article.

MigratedToFromArticle.title: Mapping info between old Article and migrated Article
MigratedToFromArticle.description: The ID for the corresponding pre- or post-migration article. Contains values only in orgs that migrate from Knowledge in Salesforce Classic to Lightning Knowledge. This field is available in API version 45.0 and later.

TotalViewCount.title: Total View Count
TotalViewCount.description: Total number of views for this article. This field is available in API version 39.0 and later.

data.label: Knowledge
